title: Guest Dua For Host
description: Authentic supplications for Guest Dua For Host
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Guest Dua For Host. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 182
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِيمَا رَزَقْتَهُم، وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma barik lahum feema razaqtahum, waghfir lahum warhamhum.
items.translation: O Allah, bless for them, that which You have provided them, forgive them and have mercy upon them.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء الضيف لأهل الطعام
